items.sentence: Tom doesn\'t know what time he\'s supposed to be there.
The phone call was a trick to get him out of the house.
I have reason to think that we\'ll never see Tom again.
Tom just stood there, looking at himself in the mirror.
Would it be OK if I went over to Tom\'s this afternoon?
Why does the phone always ring when I\'m in the shower?
Tom poured cold water over Mary\'s face to wake her up.
I don\'t know whether to go away or to stay where I am.
I think it\'s time for me to get a new pair of glasses.
I haven\'t decided yet whether I will attend the party.
